notifications.title: Important Update Information
notifications.content:
Server Maintenance

Our cloud nesting servers will be undergoing maintenance on November 5th, 2023 from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM UTC.

During this time, the cloud nesting feature may be unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Thank you for your understanding.

notifications.title: New Feature Preview
notifications.content:
Coming Soon: Multiple Material Support

We're excited to announce that in our next major update, Deepnest will support nesting across multiple materials simultaneously!

  • Optimize material usage across different sheet types
  • Set material-specific constraints
  • Generate comprehensive reports by material

Stay tuned for more information about this exciting new feature.

notifications.title: Subscription Changes
notifications.content:
Updated Subscription Plans

Starting October 1st, 2023, we are updating our subscription plans to provide even more value:

PlanOld PriceNew Price
Basic$9.99/month$8.99/month
Professional$19.99/month$17.99/month

Existing subscribers will automatically receive these new rates on their next billing cycle.

View Full Details

notifications.title: Ads for Deepnest
notifications.content:
Introducing Deepnest Pro

Upgrade to Deepnest Pro for advanced nesting features, priority support, and ad-free experience!

Get started today and take your nesting to the next level.

Upgrade Now

notifications.title: Online converter down
notifications.content:
How to replace

Yesterday I was informed that the converter API of convert.deepnest.io is no longer available. Since there were no changes after the usual up to 60 minutes. So I quickly put together an API for you. Actually I wasn't ready yet, but after 8 hours I could at least report a success for my tests and provide instructions on how you can overwrite the converter until the next update

You can find more information at: GitHub comment

Greetings, Josef
From your deepnest-next team!
